entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind light except east 30 km/h along parts of the coast. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
